summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3892 for the improvement of Virginia Street, from 7th Avenue to 9th Avenue; by paving a strip eighteen (18) feet in width; under Ordinance No. 47462, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
